query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS custom_agent_profiles (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  slug VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT NOT NULL,
  icon VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Bot',
  color VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'purple',
  systemPrompt TEXT NOT NULL,
  outputStyle ENUM('concise', 'detailed', 'balanced') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'balanced',
  codeGeneration ENUM('full', 'diffs', 'none') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'diffs',
  testingApproach ENUM('test_first', 'test_after', 'no_tests') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'test_after',
  settings JSON,
  usageCount INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  lastUsedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  isPublic BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX custom_agent_profiles_user_id_idx (userId),
  INDEX custom_agent_profiles_slug_idx (slug)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user D8P1hPzTB2gvSDs.1e2fcfb2221e --database 32FJ7HPReivSdgawqQ3aa4 --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS custom_agent_profiles (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  slug VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT NOT NULL,

  color VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'purple',
  systemPrompt TEXT NOT NULL,
  outputStyle ENUM('concise', 'detailed', 'balanced') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'balanced',
  codeGeneration ENUM('full', 'diffs', 'none') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'diffs',
  testingApproach ENUM('test_first', 'test_after', 'no_tests') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'test_after',
  settings JSON,
  usageCount INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  lastUsedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  isPublic BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX custom_agent_profiles_user_id_idx (userId),
  INDEX custom_agent_profiles_slug_idx (slug)
);
